DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study examine AZD6140 affect patient severe kidney disease compare volunteer normal kidney . Subjects study receive one dose AZD6140 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effects AZD6140 Patients With Renal Impairment Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Patients must severe kidney disease Subjects match kidney disease patient term weight , age , sex must normal kidneys All woman must postmenopausal ( longer menstruate ) surgically sterile Patients require dialysis History allergy aspirin clopidogrel Have increase bleeding risk ( instance uncontrolled high blood pressure recent major injury ) Recent history fainting lightheadedness
